EmailTemplate.name: PWS_Email_Customer Exit Email_Q315.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Please answer One quick question to help PWS become better
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
I am a product manager working on Pivotal Web Services (PWS) and I am writing because in the past you upgraded to use the full capabilities of PWS but later discontinued using the service. In an effort to make PWS better, I have one quick question.
What made you discontinue using Pivotal Web Services?
Thank you for your time.
Best Regards,
Charles Wu Product Manager Pivotal Web Services
